headline.main: DRIVE HERE TO AID PLASTIC SURGERY; $200,000 Fund Sought to Buy Equipment for Britain

lead_paragraph: To meet the "urgent psychological need" to repair the mutilated faces and bodies of civilian and military victims of aerial warfare in Britain as quickly as possible, a campaign to obtain $200,000 in this country for plastic surgery equipment was opened yesterday at a luncheon in the Hotel Plaza.
abstract: Brit-Amer Ambulance Corps sponsors drive for plastic surgery equipment
